sections.title: Arcane Trickster (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Arcane Trickster class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Arcane tricksters gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor when taking levels in this prestige class.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Arcane trickster levels advance spellcasting progression from a previous class, granting spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level but no other class benefits.

sections.title: Ranged Legerdemain (Su) (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Allows use of Disable Device and Sleight of Hand skills at 30 feet range with a +5 DC increase, affecting objects weighing 5 pounds or less.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, dealing +1d6 extra damage every other level and stacking with sneak attack from other sources.

sections.title: Impromptu Sneak Attack (Ex) (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Once per day (twice at 7th level), declare any attack within 30 feet to be a sneak attack, causing the target to lose Dex bonus to AC for that attack.

sections.title: Tricky Spells (Su) (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Cast spells without somatic or verbal components as if using Still Spell and Silent Spell metamagic feats, without increasing spell level or casting time.

sections.title: Invisible Thief (Su) (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Become invisible as greater invisibility as a free action for a number of rounds per day equal to arcane trickster level.

sections.title: Surprise Spells (Arcane Trickster)
sections.description: Add sneak attack damage to spells that deal hit point damage against flat-footed targets, with the same damage type as the spell.
